title: BrucePac Recalls Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: Oct. 15, 2024 - This release is being reissued as an expansion of the October 9, 2024 recall to include additional products and production dates. Details of this release were updated to note the addition of 1,779,040 pounds of product subject to recall...

establishment.name: BrucePac
activities: Certification - Export;  Meat Processing;  Poultry Processing
